member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetAngleX
member.summary: Changes the value of the AngleX property of a 2D skew transform. The AngleX property specifies the skew angle along the x-axis.
member.param: The new skew angle of the x-axis, in degrees. A positive value creates a counterclockwise skew, and a negative value creates a clockwise skew. For values less than –360 or greater than 360, the values wrap around and are treated as if the mathematical operation mod(360) was applied.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetAngleX
member.summary: Animates the value of the AngleX property of a 2D skew transform. The AngleX property specifies the skew angle along the x-axis.
member.param: An animation object that represents how the value of the AngleX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetAngleY
member.summary: Changes the value of the AngleY property of a 2D skew transform. The AngleY property specifies the skew angle along the y-axis.
member.param: The new skew angle of the y-axis, in degrees. A positive value creates a counterclockwise skew, and a negative value creates a clockwise skew. For values less than –360 or greater than 360, the values wrap around and are treated as if the mathematical operation mod(360) was applied.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetAngleY
member.summary: Animates the value of the AngleY property of a 2D skew transform. The AngleY property specifies the skew angle along the y-axis.
member.param: An animation object that represents how the value of the AngleY property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetCenterX
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterX property of a 2D skew transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which the skew is performed.
member.param: The new x-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetCenterX
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterX property of a 2D skew transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which the skew is performed.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetCenterY
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterY property of a 2D skew transform. The CenterY property specifies the y-coordinate of the point about which the skew is performed.
member.param: The new y-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform.SetCenterY
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterY property of a 2D skew transform. The CenterY property specifies the y-coordinate of the point about which the skew is performed.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterY property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionSkewTransform
member.summary: Represents a 2D transformation that affects the skew of a visual along the x-axis and y-axis. The coordinate system is skewed around the specified center point.
